name: Gran Trak 10 (Star Stormer 101)
description:
Controls:

Forward-UpArrow/Reverse-Down Arrow/Left-Left Arrow/Right-Right Arrow

Info: Avoid bumping into tires at high speed. You lose 2 seconds on the timer each time you do. You'll regain 5 seconds each time you cross the finish line, but you must pass the yellow checkpoint for it to work.
